30.eng-name: Divination and Omens (Kitab Al-Kahanah Wa Al-Tatayyur)

hadiths.text: Narrated Mu'awiyah b. al-Hakam al-Sulami:I said: Messenger of Allah! among us there are men who practice divination by drawing lines. He said: There was a Prophet who drew lines, so if anyone does it as he drew lines, that is right

chapter.eng-name: Al-Khatt, and Al-'Iyafah (Being Dissuaded By Birds)
